job_description: Python Developer*Job Type: Full-time**Marsec developers Pvt ltd company seeking an experienced Python Developer to join our team! Our mission is to leverage technology to drive innovation and make a meaningful impact.*Job Description*We're looking for a skilled Python Developer to design, develop, and deploy scalable, efficient, and reliable software solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in Python programming, excellent problem-solving skills, and a passion for staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.*Responsibilities*- Design, develop, test, and deploy Python applications- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements- Implement automated testing and deployment scripts- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues- Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of the codebase- Stay current with industry developments and apply this knowledge to improve processes*Requirements*- 3+ years of experience with Python development- Strong understanding of Python fundamentals, including data structures, file operations, and object-oriented programming- Experience with popular Python frameworks and libraries (e.g., Django, Flask, NumPy, pandas)- Familiarity with databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail- Strong communication and collaboration skills- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field*Nice to Have*- Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)- Knowledge of containerization (e.g., Docker) and orchestration (e.g., Kubernetes)- Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD)- Experience with data science and machine learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow)*What We Offer*- Competitive salary and benefits package- Opportunity to work on challenging projects with cutting-edge technology- Collaborative and dynamic work environment- Professional development and growth opportunities- Flexible working hours and remote work options
